mapper.sql: insert into user_tab(USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PWD, TEL, SEX,CREATE_DATE,COMPANY,DEPARTMENT) values (#{USER_CODE}, #{USER_NAME}, md5('123456'), #{TEL},${SEX}, now(),#{COMPANY},#{DEPARTMENT})
update user_tab set USER_CODE=#{USER_CODE}, USER_NAME=#{USER_NAME}, TEL=#{TEL}, SEX=#{SEX}, COMPANY=#{COMPANY}, DEPARTMENT=#{DEPARTMENT}, SCHEDULE_CENTER=#{SCHEDULE_CENTER} where USER_ID=#{USER_ID}
update user_tab set pic = #{pic} where user_id = '$_CRU_USER_ID_$'
select pic from user_tab where user_id ='$_CRU_USER_ID_$' and is_del = 'N'

select ut.USER_ID,ut.USER_CODE,ut.USER_NAME,ut.SEX,ut.TEL,ut.CREATE_DATE,ut.COMPANY,ut.DEPARTMENT,CASE ut.IS_DISABLED WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '' END as IS_DISABLED,ut.IS_DEL, GROUP_CONCAT(f.role_name) role_name from user_tab ut left join user_role_bsm_tab curbt on ut.USER_ID=curbt.user_id left join(select * from role_bsm_tab where is_del='N') f on curbt.role_id=f.role_id where 1=1
and ut.IS_DISABLED = #{columns[0][search][value]}
and ut.USER_NAME like '%${columns[1][search][value]}%'
and ut.TEL like '%${columns[2][search][value]}%'
AND ut.IS_DEL = 'N' GROUP BY ut.USER_ID order by DATE_FORMAT(ut.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') DESC
select * from user_tab where USER_ID=#{USER_ID}

select c.ROLE_ID,c.ROLE_NAME,c.REMARK,d.NAME as PNAME,IF(e.USER_ID != '' ,'Y','N') BE_ASSIGN from role_bsm_tab c left join ( select ROLE_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(NAME) as NAME from ((select ROLE_ID,PRIV_ID as PRIV_ID1 from role_priv_bsm_tab ) a left JOIN (select PRIV_ID as PRIV_ID2,NAME from priv_bsm_tab) b on a.PRIV_ID1 = b.PRIV_ID2) GROUP BY ROLE_ID ) d on c.ROLE_ID = d.ROLE_ID left join user_role_bsm_tab e on e.ROLE_ID = c.ROLE_ID and e.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} where c.is_del='N'
and ROLE_NAME like '%${Q_ROLE_NAME}%'
delete from user_role_bsm_tab where USER_ID=#{userId}
insert into user_role_bsm_tab (ROLE_ID, USER_ID) values (#{roleIds}, #{userId})
update user_tab set IS_DEL='Y' where USER_ID=#{USER_ID}
update user_tab set USER_PWD=md5('123456') where USER_ID=#{user_id}
UPDATE user_tab U SET U.USER_PWD = MD5(#{USER_PWD}) WHERE U.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
update user_tab set IS_DISABLED='1' where user_id =#{USER_ID}
update user_tab set IS_DISABLED='0' where user_id =#{USER_ID}

select
count(c.role_id)
c.ROLE_ID,c.ROLE_NAME,c.REMARK,d.NAME as PNAME
from role_bsm_tab c left join ( select ROLE_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(NAME) as NAME from ((select ROLE_ID,PRIV_ID as PRIV_ID1 from role_priv_bsm_tab ) a left JOIN (select PRIV_ID as PRIV_ID2,NAME from priv_bsm_tab) b on a.PRIV_ID1 = b.PRIV_ID2) GROUP BY ROLE_ID ) d on c.ROLE_ID = d.ROLE_ID where c.is_del='N'
and ROLE_NAME like '%${columns[0][search][value]}%'
order by c.role_id desc
LIMIT ${page_start},${page_end}
insert into role_bsm_tab(ROLE_NAME, REMARK) values (#{ROLE_NAME}, #{REMARK})
select * from role_bsm_tab where ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID}
update role_bsm_tab set is_del='Y' where ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID}
delete from role_priv_bsm_tab where ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID}
delete from user_role_bsm_tab where ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID}

SELECT A.PRIV_ID, A.NAME, A.PID, A.IS_FOLDER, IF(B.PRIV_ID IS NULL, 'FALSE', 'TRUE') IS_CHECKED FROM priv_bsm_tab A LEFT JOIN (SELECT T.ROLE_ID, T.PRIV_ID FROM role_priv_bsm_tab T WHERE T.ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID}) B ON A.PRIV_ID = B.PRIV_ID WHERE A.IS_DEL = 'N' AND A.PRIV_ID IN ( SELECT PRIV_ID FROM role_priv_bsm_tab T WHERE T.ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID} )
DELETE FROM role_priv_bsm_tab WHERE ROLE_ID = #{P_ROLE_ID}
INSERT INTO role_priv_bsm_tab (ROLE_ID, PRIV_ID) VALUES (#{P_ROLE_ID},#{P_PRIV_ID})

SELECT A.PRIV_ID UNID, A.NAME TEXT, (CASE A.PID WHEN '0' THEN '#' ELSE A.PID END) PARENT_ID, A.PNAME, A.SORT, A.IS_FOLDER, A.IS_DEL, A.REMARK, A.CREATED, A.LASTMOD, A.CREATER, A.MODIFYER, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM priv_bsm_tab WHERE IS_DEL = 'N' AND PID = A.PRIV_ID) CHILDNUM FROM priv_bsm_tab A WHERE A.IS_DEL = 'N'

select a.* from priv_bsm_tab a WHERE a.IS_DEL='N'
and priv_id=${id}
insert into priv_bsm_tab(PID, PNAME, NAME, remark, IS_FOLDER, is_del, CREATED, CREATER) values (#{PID}, #{PNAME}, #{PRIV_NAME}, #{REMARK}, #{IS_FOLDER}, 'N', now(), '$_CRU_USER_ID_$')
update sys_url_tab set priv_id=#{privId} where url_id=#{urlids}
update sys_url_tab set priv_id=null where url_id=#{urlid}
update priv_bsm_tab set NAME=#{PRIV_NAME}, remark=#{REMARK}, IS_FOLDER=#{IS_FOLDER}, lastmod=now(), modifyer='$_CRU_USER_ID_$' where priv_id=${PRIV_ID}
update priv_bsm_tab set is_del='Y' where priv_id=${id}
update priv_bsm_tab set is_del='Y' where pid=${id}
select * from dict_sailline
select * from dict_country

select * from dict_common where 1=1 and is_del = 'N'
and type = '${type}'
order by seq

SELECT DISTINCT A.type UNID, A.NAME TEXT, '#' PARENT_ID, '' PNAME, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dict_common WHERE IS_DEL = 'N' AND type = A.type) CHILDNUM FROM dict_common A WHERE A.IS_DEL = 'N' order by A.TYPE
insert into dict_common (id,tag,type,name,code,text) values (UUID(),#{tag},#{type},#{name},#{code},#{text})
insert into dict_common (id,tag,type,name,code,text,seq,parent_code) values (UUID(),#{tag},#{type},#{name},#{code},#{text},#{seq},#{parent_code})

SELECT sl.LOGIN_IP, sl.USER_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(sl.ADD_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') ADD_TIME, sl.USER_ID, sl.USER_NAME FROM sys_log_tab sl WHERE 1=1
AND instr(sl.USER_CODE,'${columns[0][search][value]}')>0
AND instr(sl.USER_NAME,'${columns[1][search][value]}')>0
AND sl.ADD_TIME >= '${columns[2][search][value]} 00:00:00'
AND '${columns[3][search][value]} 23:59:59' >= sl.ADD_TIME

SELECT aa.* from (SELECT M.MENU_ID UNID,sut.PRIV_ID, (CASE M.PARENT_MENU_ID WHEN '0' THEN '#' ELSE M.PARENT_MENU_ID END) PARENT_ID, M.MENU_NAME TEXT FROM sys_menu_tab M LEFT JOIN sys_url_tab sut ON M.URL_ID=sut.URL_ID ORDER BY M.PARENT_MENU_ID, M.SEQUENCE) aa
SELECT M.MENU_NAME FROM sys_menu_tab M WHERE M.MENU_ID = ${MENU_ID}

SELECT M.URL_ID, M.MENU_PATH, M.PARENT_MENU_ID, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_TYPE, M.SEQUENCE MENU_SEQ, T.MENU_NAME AS PARENT_MENU_NAME, M.REMARK FROM sys_menu_tab M LEFT JOIN sys_menu_tab T ON T.MENU_ID = M.PARENT_MENU_ID WHERE M.MENU_ID=${MENU_ID}

INSERT INTO sys_menu_tab (URL_ID, MENU_PATH, PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_CODE, MENU_TYPE, SEQUENCE, SYS_ABBR, REMARK) VALUES (#{URL_ID}, #{MENU_PATH}, ${PARENT_MENU_ID}, #{MENU_NAME}, #{MENU_CODE}, #{MENU_TYPE}, #{MENU_SEQ}, 'cms', #{REMARK})

UPDATE sys_menu_tab M SET M.URL_ID = #{URL_ID}, M.MENU_PATH = #{MENU_PATH}, M.MENU_NAME = #{MENU_NAME}, M.MENU_CODE = #{MENU_CODE}, M.MENU_TYPE = #{MENU_TYPE}, M.SEQUENCE = #{MENU_SEQ}, M.REMARK = #{REMARK} WHERE M.MENU_ID = ${MENU_ID}
DELETE FROM sys_menu_tab WHERE MENU_ID = ${MENU_ID}

SELECT
COUNT(P.URL_ID)
P.URL_ID, P.FULL_URL, P.TITLE, P.SERVICE_NAME, P.PAGE, P.SQL_ID, P.VALIDATION_ID, P.REMARK
FROM sys_url_tab P WHERE P.SYS_CODE = 'cms' AND (P.PRIV_ID IS NULL OR P.PRIV_ID = '')
AND P.URL_ID LIKE '%${columns[0][search][value]}%'
AND P.SERVICE_NAME LIKE '%${columns[1][search][value]}%'
AND P.SQL_ID LIKE '%${columns[2][search][value]}%'
ORDER BY P.URL_ID DESC LIMIT ${page_start},${page_end}
SELECT P.URL_ID, P.FULL_URL, P.TITLE, P.SERVICE_NAME, P.PAGE, P.SQL_ID, P.VALIDATION_ID, P.REMARK FROM sys_url_tab P WHERE P.URL_ID = #{URL_ID}

INSERT INTO sys_url_tab (URL_ID, FULL_URL, TITLE, SERVICE_NAME, PAGE, REMARK, SYS_CODE, SQL_ID, VALIDATION_ID, PRIV_ID) VALUES (#{URL_ID}, #{FULL_URL}, #{TITLE}, #{SERVICE_NAME}, #{PAGE}, #{REMARK}, 'cms', #{SQL_ID}, #{VALIDATION_ID}, #{PRIV_ID})

UPDATE sys_url_tab P SET P.URL_ID = #{URL_ID}, P.FULL_URL = #{FULL_URL}, P.TITLE = #{TITLE}, P.SERVICE_NAME = #{SERVICE_NAME}, P.PAGE = #{PAGE}, P.REMARK = #{REMARK}, P.SQL_ID = #{SQL_ID}, P.VALIDATION_ID = #{VALIDATION_ID} WHERE P.URL_ID = #{URLID}
DELETE FROM sys_url_tab WHERE URL_ID = #{URL_ID}

sql.isEqual: select distinct id,building_no text from sys_building_tab
select distinct id,

SELECT T.CENTER_CODE ID,TRIM(T.CENTER_NAME) TEXT FROM tab_schedule_center T
WHERE T.CENTER_NAME LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY T.CENTER_ID DESC

SELECT T.CENTER_NAME ID,TRIM(T.CENTER_NAME) TEXT FROM tab_schedule_center T
WHERE T.CENTER_NAME LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY T.CENTER_ID DESC

SELECT S.NAME_CN ID, TRIM(S.NAME_CN) TEXT FROM tab_ship S
WHERE S.NAME_CN LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY S.SHIP_ID DESC

SELECT P.PORT_CODE ID,TRIM(CONCAT(P.PORT_CODE,' ',P.PORT_CN)) TEXT FROM tab_port P
WHERE CONCAT(P.PORT_CODE,P.PORT_CN) LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY P.PORT_ID DESC

SELECT C.OWNNER_ID ID,TRIM(C.COMPANY) TEXT FROM tab_cargo_ownner C WHERE C.COMPANY_TYPE = 'hz'
AND C.COMPANY LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%' OR C.COMPANY_CODE LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY C.OWNNER_ID DESC

SELECT C.OWNNER_ID ID,TRIM(C.COMPANY) TEXT FROM tab_cargo_ownner C WHERE C.COMPANY_TYPE = 'hd'
AND C.COMPANY LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%' OR C.COMPANY_CODE LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY C.OWNNER_ID DESC

SELECT DRIVER_ID ID,TRIM(CONCAT(NAME,'(',MOBILE_1,')')) TEXT FROM tab_driver WHERE IS_DEL='N' AND CURRENT_STATUS !='离职'
AND (NAME LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%' OR MOBILE_1 LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%') ;

SELECT A.CODE ID,TRIM(A.NAME) TEXT,A.ID AREA_ID,A.LAT,A.LNG,A.PROVINCE,A.CITY FROM dict_area A
WHERE A.NAME LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY A.ID DESC
SELECT TRUCK_PLATE ID,TRIM(TRUCK_PLATE) TEXT FROM tab_frame_truck WHERE IS_DEL='N' AND TYPE='F';
SELECT CODE ID,TRIM(CODE) TEXT FROM tab_frame_truck WHERE IS_DEL='N' AND TYPE='F';

SELECT O.OWNNER_ID ID,TRIM(O.SHORTCUT) TEXT FROM tab_box_ownner O
WHERE TRIM(O.SHORTCUT) LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY O.OWNNER_ID DESC

SELECT F.FEE_CODE ID,TRIM(F.FEE_TYPE) TEXT FROM dict_fee F WHERE F.IS_DEL='N'
AND F.FEE_TYPE LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY F.ID

SELECT S.SAILLINE ID,TRIM(S.SAILLINE) TEXT FROM dict_sailline S
WHERE S.SAILLINE LIKE '%${sSearch_0}%'
ORDER BY S.SAILCODE
SELECT NAME ID,TRIM(NAME) TEXT FROM dict_area WHERE MATOU = 1
SELECT CHINESENAME ID,TRIM(CHINESENAME) TEXT FROM dict_country
